rules.sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'

dqAdditionalInfo.investigationQuery:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'

rules.sql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT TABLE_NAME) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = CURRENT_SCHEMA() AND TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' AND TABLE_NAME NOT IN (SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY')
rules.description: Check for tables without primary keys

dqAdditionalInfo.investigationQuery:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT TABLE_NAME) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = CURRENT_SCHEMA() AND TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' AND TABLE_NAME NOT IN (SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY')

rules.sql:
SELECT ROUND(SUM(BYTES)/1024/1024, 2) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_STORAGE_METRICS WHERE ACTIVE_BYTES > 0

dqAdditionalInfo.investigationQuery:
SELECT ROUND(SUM(BYTES)/1024/1024, 2) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_STORAGE_METRICS WHERE ACTIVE_BYTES > 0

rules.sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' AND LAST_ALTERED > DATEADD(DAY, -7, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())

dqAdditionalInfo.investigationQuery:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' AND LAST_ALTERED > DATEADD(DAY, -7, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())

rules.sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' AND ROW_COUNT = 0
rules.description: Validate no tables with zero rows

dqAdditionalInfo.investigationQuery:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' AND ROW_COUNT = 0

rules.sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_STORAGE_METRICS WHERE TABLE_DROPPED IS NULL AND ACTIVE_BYTES > 0 AND TABLE_LAST_ALTERED < DATEADD(DAY, -30, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
rules.description: Check for stale tables (not accessed in 30 days)

dqAdditionalInfo.investigationQuery:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_STORAGE_METRICS WHERE TABLE_DROPPED IS NULL AND ACTIVE_BYTES > 0 AND TABLE_LAST_ALTERED < DATEADD(DAY, -30, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())

rules.sql:
SELECT SUM(ROW_COUNT) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'
rules.description: Monitor total row count across all tables

dqAdditionalInfo.investigationQuery:
SELECT SUM(ROW_COUNT) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'

rules.sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 (SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = CURRENT_SCHEMA() GROUP BY COLUMN_NAME HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT TABLE_NAME) > 5)
rules.description: Check for duplicate column names across tables

dqAdditionalInfo.investigationQuery:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 (SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = CURRENT_SCHEMA() GROUP BY COLUMN_NAME HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT TABLE_NAME) > 5)

rules.sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = CURRENT_SCHEMA()

dqAdditionalInfo.investigationQuery:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = CURRENT_SCHEMA()

rules.sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 (SELECT TABLE_NAME, COUNT(*) AS COL_COUNT FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = CURRENT_SCHEMA() GROUP BY TABLE_NAME HAVING COUNT(*) > 50)
rules.description: Check for tables with too many columns

dqAdditionalInfo.investigationQuery:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 (SELECT TABLE_NAME, COUNT(*) AS COL_COUNT FROM 
 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = CURRENT_SCHEMA() GROUP BY TABLE_NAME HAVING COUNT(*) > 50)

rules.sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
 TABLE(INFORMATION_SCHEMA.QUERY_HISTORY(DATE_RANGE_START=>DATEADD('hour',-24,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()))) WHERE ERROR_CODE IS NOT NULL
rules.description: Monitor query history for failed queries
